resources.string: Capitalize the first word of each sentence
Spacebar and punctuation automatically correct mistyped words
Use the previous word in making suggestions
"Your custom input style needs to be enabled before you start using it. Do you want to enable it now?"
See the suggested word while gesturing
Input a word by sliding through the letters
Language switch key covers other input methods too
Do not suggest potentially offensive words
Help improve this input method editor by automatically sending usage statistics and crash reports
Select a dictionary file to install
No dictionary files in the Downloads folder
Please demonstrate the issue you are writing about.\n\nWhen finished, select the \"Bug?\" button again."
The feedback field must not be empty.
Logging temporarily suspended. To disable permanently, go to Android Keyboard Settings
Please exit the feedback dialog to access the research log menu
Attention! You are using the special keyboard for research purposes.
"%s is already enabled in your Language & input settings, so this step is done. On to the next one!"
"Please check \"%s\" in your Language & input settings. This will authorize it to run on your device."
"Next, select \"%s\" as your active text-input method."
Now you can type in all your favorite apps with %s.

The selected language on your mobile device has an available dictionary.
We recommend downloading the %1$s dictionary to improve your typing experience.

The download could take a minute or two over 3G. Charges may apply if you don\'t have an unlimited data plan.
If you are not sure which data plan you have, we recommend finding a Wi-Fi connection to start the download automatically.

Tip: You can download and remove dictionaries by going to Language & input in the Settings menu of your mobile device.
Show when multiple input languages are enabled
Display application icon in the launcher
Display visual cue while sliding from Shift or Symbol keys
Plug in a headset to hear password keys spoken aloud.
Downloading: suggestions for %1$s will be ready soon.
Use names from Contacts for suggestions and corrections
Spell checker uses entries from your contact list
Double tap on spacebar inserts a period followed by a space
You don\'t have any words in the user dictionary. Add a word by touching the Add (+) button.
